p: In a RCT of Gao with patients with advanced lung cancer treatment with Ganoderma lucidum resulted in a significant increase in Karnofsky scores (i.e., in >10 scores) in 50% of the 32 verum patients compared to placebo (in comparison to 14% of the 29 patients in the placebo group) ( Gao et al., 2003a). Nine (28%) and seven (22%) patients receiving verum had unchanged and reduced Karnofsky scores in comparison to 13 (46%) and 11 (39%) in the placebo group.
